mapper.select: select ohsModule.*, ohsTable.id as id1, ohsTable.sys_id as sys_id1, ohsTable.schema_name as schema_name, ohsTable.table_name as table_name, ohsTable.table_chn_name as table_chn_name, ohsTable.create_date as create_date, ohsTable.create_user as create_user, ohsTable.update_date as update_date, ohsTable.update_user as update_user from ohs_table_config ohsTable inner join ohs_module_table_config ohsModuleTable on ohsTable.id = ohsModuleTable.table_id inner join ohs_module_config ohsModule on ohsModule.id = ohsModuleTable.module_id and ohsTable.sys_id = ohsModule.sys_id
